other_tests.procedure_name: Direct nucleotide sequencing of FGF23 and PHEX
other_tests.findings: The elder daughter was heterozygous for an R567X mutation in PHEX; the father was also heterozygous for this mutation, indicating somatic mosaicism.
The father transmitted the genotypes for 18 markers on the X chromosome equally to his two daughters.

other_tests.procedure_name: Single-nucleotide primer extension and denaturing HPLC analysis
other_tests.findings: 60% of the father’s leukocyte DNA had the mutant genotype; in the proband, it was 56%, and in the sister, it was 0%.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Different ratios of the mutant allele noted in the father’s hair root DNA demonstrate variation in mutation distribution.

other_tests.findings: Displayed a 46, XY karyotype for the father.
